text: (February 5, 1944 - July 20, 2018) was a Japanese political activist. He was known for his perennial candidacy for Mayor of Tokyo. He called himself The only God Matayoshi Mitsuo Jesus Christ (唯一神又吉光雄・イエス・キリスト) or Jesus Matayoshi (又吉イエス). He was a conservative politician. In 1997, he created the World Economic Community Party (世界経済共同体党), a political party based on his belief that he was God. Matayoshi died from kidney cancer on 20 July 2018 in Tokyo, aged 74. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Tokyo
title: Mitsuo Matayoshi
